MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L13 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Herrick Street and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 6 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:47 PM on 7th March 2021..
